index.title: Home
index.description: UI engineer Felix Berger from Berlin.
index.aboutContent1: Hi, I'm Felix Berger. I'm an independent UI engineer living in Berlin, Germany.
index.aboutContent2: I build effective, performant and inclusive products for the web and I offer 10 years of experience in frontend development.
index.skillsContent1: As a developer with experience working on large scale web frontends, I support projects with modern and maintainable code. I apply progressive enhancement techniques and my knowledge gathered in over 8 years of accessible web development to guarantee broad acess to digital experiences.
index.skillsContent2: As a former information architect, I have the ability to bridge the gap between design and implementation. I help brands building semantic architecture and responsive interfaces that are both engaging and easy to use.
